process.title: Ingredient Selection
process.description: We carefully source the finest ingredients - organic whole wheat flour, pure jaggery from trusted suppliers, fresh desi ghee, and aromatic spices.

process.title: Dough Preparation
process.description: Our skilled artisans mix the ingredients using traditional techniques, ensuring the perfect consistency and texture for our signature cookies.

process.title: Shaping & Baking
process.description: Each cookie is hand-shaped and baked in controlled temperature ovens to achieve the perfect golden-brown color and crisp texture.

process.title: Quality Check & Packaging
process.description: Every batch undergoes rigorous quality checks before being carefully packaged in eco-friendly materials to maintain freshness.
